pages.text: 23|75|Ware ga jihi o hodokoshite kare-ra o nayamasu saiyaku o nozoite mo, meiro ni shūchaku shite tohō mo naku samayoudearou.
23|76|Katsute, ware wa kare-ra ni chōbatsu o kuwaetaga, kare-ra wa nao, omoni heri kudaru koto naku, sunao ni tangan shinai.
23|77|Ware ga kibishī keibatsu e no mon o, kare-ra ni hiraku made wa. Mi nasai. Kare-ra wa sore de zetsubō shite iru.
23|78|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame ni, chōkaku to shikaku to kokoro (chikaku, rikai-ryoku) o tsukura reta katadearu. Daga anata gata wa, kansha shinai.
23|79|Anata gata o chijō ni, hanshoku sa se rareta no wa karedearu. Kare no omoto ni, anata gata wa atsume rareru.
23|80|Kare koso wa, ikashi mata shina se rareru katadeari, hiru to yoru no kōtai o kisei sa reru. Anata gata wa nao rikai shinai no ka.
23|81|Iya, kare-ra wa, mukashi no hito ga itta no to, onajiyōna koto o itte iru.
23|82|Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natta toki, hontōni yomigaera sa rerudarou ka.
23|83|Hontōni watashi-tachi mo watashi-tachi no sosen mo, katsu teko no koto o yakusoku sa rete ita. Kore wa tada mukashi no monogatari nisuginai.'
23|84|Itte yaru ga ī. `Daichi to soko ni aru subete no mono wa, dare no monodearu ka. Shitte irunara (itte mi nasai).'
23|85|Kare-ra wa kanarazu,`arrā no yūdearu.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa, mada kigatsukanai no ka.'
23|86|Itte yaru ga ī. `7Tsu no ten no shu, eikō ni michita shikō no gyokuza no omo wa, daredearu no ka.'
23|87|Kare-ra wa kanarazu,`arrā.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa nao osorenai no ka.
23|88|Subete no jibutsu no tōgyo wa, dare no te ni aru no ka. (Ban'yū o) shugo shi,(dare karamo) shugo sa renai kata (wa dare ka), anata gataga shitte irunaraba,(itte mi nasai).'
23|89|Kare-ra wa kanarazu `arrā.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Sorenara anata gata wa, dōshite madowasa reta no ka.'
